title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content:
downloaded via the Larian Studios website by linking a Larian Account in-game. On top of these digital goodies, those who purchased the Digital Deluxe Edition will receive the Treasures of Rivellon Pack, an in-game Item Pack with equipment inspired by 5 Origin characters of Divinity: Original Sin II

Mask of the Shapeshifter - Headgear that allows you to change race and appearance on the fly, inspired by Fane Cape of the Red Prince - Cloak inspired by the Red Prince Lute of the Merryweather Bard
